about.details:
Omnipotent Industries are primarily engaged in the business of supplying bulk and packed bitumen as well as other bituminous products. The company either directly imports these products or buys from third-party importers and sells them to their various distributors as well as corporates. The company's products include bitumen 60/70 & 80/100, bitumen VG10, VG30, VG 40; bitumen emulsion, blown bitumen, micro surfacing bitumen, and modified bitumen CRMB, PMB, NRMB.

The company is also engaged in consultancy services of setting up of plants for Bitumen & Bituminous products. The company provides end-to-end solutions from identification of land, plant & machinery to imparting training & making policy with staff on marketing & quality testing. The company has relationships with various importers, manufacturers, transporters, warehousing & bulk storage entities which gives them a cost advantage due to bulk purchase as well as sharing of logistics costs.

The company is in the process of shifting its plant at Gandhidham, Kutch, Gujarat, which will be managed by a third-party operator.

Competitive Strengths:

  • Focus on procurement, sales, and customer service
  • A strong relationship with business stakeholders
  • In house dedicated processes
  • Experienced & qualified Team

faqs.question: What is the Omnipotent Industries IPO?
faqs.answer:
Omnipotent Industries IPO is a SME IPO of equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹18.90 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹63 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on November 16, 2021, and closes on November 22, 2021.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Omnipotent Industries IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Omnipotent Industries IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Omnipotent Industries IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Omnipotent Industries IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Omnipotent Industries IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Omnipotent Industries IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Omnipotent Industries IPO opens on November 16, 2021 and closes on November 22, 2021.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Omnipotent Industries IPO?
faqs.answer: Omnipotent Industries IPO lot size is 2000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,26,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Omnipotent Industries IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Omnipotent Industries IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Omnipotent Industries IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Omnipotent Industries IPO will be done on Thursday, November 25, 2021, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Monday, November 29, 2021. Check the Omnipotent Industries IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Omnipotent Industries IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Omnipotent Industries IPO listing date is on Monday, November 29, 2021.
